name: The Adventures of Arthur: A 3d Platformer Pc Game
name_original: The Adventures of Arthur: A 3d Platformer Pc Game
description:
The Adventures of Arthur is a 3d platformer Pc game.

The story began in a village with a young boy named Arthur, an adventurer that was given a task by the Village Chief (Cyno) to find his daughter (Scarlet). Arthur needs to overcome the challenges and obstacles to find Scarlet.

This Game was made for our school project
